products.name: Crispy Wave
products.water: Keep soil slightly moist
products.description: Crispy Wave is a compact bird’s nest fern with ruffled leaves. It thrives in humidity and adds a fresh, vibrant green to your space. Perfect for bathrooms or shaded corners.

products.name: Haworthia
products.water: Let soil dry completely between waterings
products.description: Haworthia retusa is a slow-growing succulent with rosette-shaped leaves. It’s ideal for sunny windowsills and needs minimal care, making it great for beginners.

products.name: Euphorbia Platyclada
products.water: Water sparingly
products.description: This rare Euphorbia has flat, coral-like stems with a unique texture and shape. It’s drought-tolerant and prefers a warm, sunny spot indoors.

products.name: Snake Plant
products.water: Allow soil to dry completely between waterings
products.description: Also known as cylindrical snake plant, this hardy plant has upright, spear-like leaves. It's almost unkillable and filters indoor air efficiently.

products.name: Golden Pothos
products.water: Water when top layer of soil is dry
products.description: Golden Pothos is a trailing vine with heart-shaped, variegated leaves. It’s one of the easiest plants to care for and great for shelves or hanging pots.

products.name: Monstera Adansonii
products.water: Water when soil feels dry
products.description: Often called the Swiss cheese plant, Monstera adansonii has striking, holey leaves. It climbs or trails and gives a tropical vibe to your space.

products.name: Arrowhead Plant
products.water: Keep soil slightly moist
products.description: Arrowhead Plant is easy-going and fast-growing, with arrow-shaped leaves. It adapts to low light and grows well in small pots or hanging baskets.

products.name: Cebu Blue Pothos
products.water: Let soil dry between waterings
products.description: Cebu Blue Pothos has silvery-blue leaves and grows quickly. It can climb or trail, and adds a stylish touch with its unique color and shape.

products.name: Chinese Money Plant
products.water: Water when top soil feels dry
products.description: The Chinese Money Plant is loved for its round, coin-like leaves. It’s compact, quirky, and known to grow little baby plants you can propagate easily.

products.name: Striped Barbados Lily
products.water: Water moderately during growth
products.description: Striped Barbados Lily blooms with striking red-orange flowers and striped petals. Though often mistaken for Amaryllis, it has its own charm and brightens any room.

products.name: Philodendron Birkin
products.water: Water when top 2–3 cm of soil is dry
products.description: Birkin is a stylish philodendron with creamy-white striped leaves. It grows upright and compact, making it ideal for desks or side tables.

products.name: Rattlesnake Plant
products.water: Keep soil evenly moist
products.description: This Calathea relative has wavy, patterned leaves with purple undersides. It's sensitive to dry air, so keep humidity up for happy foliage.

products.name: Rubber Fig
products.water: Water when top layer dries out
products.description: Ficus elastica has bold, glossy leaves and grows into a small tree over time. It's easy to care for and adapts to different light levels.

products.name: Mini Monstera
products.water: Let top soil dry between waterings
products.description: Often mistaken for a small Monstera, this plant is fast-growing and climbs well. It has split leaves that add a lush, jungle vibe.

products.name: Dwarf Umbrella Tree
products.water: Water moderately
products.description: This easy-care plant has glossy leaflets arranged like an umbrella. It’s compact and great for adding greenery without too much fuss.

products.name: Monstera Deliciosa
products.water: Water when top soil is dry
products.description: Known for its huge split leaves, Monstera deliciosa is a classic favorite. It climbs, grows big over time, and loves space to spread out.

products.name: Snake Plant
products.water: Water when completely dry
products.description: This tough plant thrives on neglect. Sansevieria has upright, patterned leaves and purifies the air, making it perfect for bedrooms or offices.

products.name: Monstera Borsigiana
products.water: Water when soil is dry to the touch
products.description: A smaller, more compact version of Monstera deliciosa. Easier to manage in tighter spaces, with the same dramatic split leaves.

products.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
products.water: Let soil dry halfway before watering
products.description: A trendy indoor tree with large, violin-shaped leaves. It likes stability and doesn’t enjoy being moved, but rewards you with stunning growth.

products.name: Heartleaf Philodendron
products.water: Water when soil feels dry
products.description: This classic trailing plant is low-maintenance and grows fast. Its heart-shaped leaves make it a sweet, soft accent in any room.

products.name: Aloe Vera
products.water: Water deeply but infrequently
products.description: A classic succulent with medicinal properties. Aloe Vera needs lots of sun and little water – great for sunny kitchens or bathrooms.

products.name: Dracaena Fragrans
products.water: Water when soil feels dry
products.description: Also called Corn Plant, this dracaena has broad, shiny leaves. It’s very forgiving and a popular choice for homes and offices.

products.name: Silver Satin Pothos
products.water: Let top 2–3 cm dry between watering
products.description: Silver Satin has velvety, silver-dappled leaves. It trails beautifully and adds texture to shelves, planters or hanging baskets.

products.name: Jade Plant
products.water: Let soil dry completely before watering
products.description: A symbol of good luck, the Jade Plant is a classic succulent with thick, shiny leaves. It grows like a tiny tree and is easy to care for.

products.name: Strelitzia Nicolai
products.water: Water when top few cm are dry
products.description: Often called Giant White Bird of Paradise, this plant grows tall and adds drama with its big, banana-like leaves. It loves light and space.

products.name: ZZ Plant
products.water: Let soil dry completely before watering
products.description: ZZ Plant is nearly indestructible. With thick, glossy leaves, it survives low light and neglect. Perfect for beginners or office desks.

products.name: False Aralia
products.water: Keep soil lightly moist
products.description: Palmaralia (now Schefflera elegantissima) has fine, finger-like leaves. It gives a tropical, airy feel and prefers warmth and humidity.

products.name: Philodendron Gloriosum
products.water: Water when top few cm are dry
products.description: This crawling philodendron has large, velvety leaves with white veins. It’s a show-stopper in any collection and thrives with a bit of space.
